metadata.title: CVE-2014-2055 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SabreDAV before 1.7.11, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.xbefore 6.0.2, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause adenial of service, or possibly have other impact via an XML External Entity(XXE) attack.

criterions.comment: php-sabredav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
